ygData.subject: Re: Hunting in Antonica
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a level 7 wizard who also abondoned Faydwer for more fertile hunting grounds.  With 1600 people online over 35% were in 4 zones of our small isle.  I found
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a level 7 wizard who also abondoned Faydwer for more fertile hunting
grounds. With 1600 people online over 35% were in 4 zones of our small
isle. I found the desert of northern Ro to be fairly profitable, and
someone there is always looking for wizards to group with.

> Hail, I just moved from Faydwer to Antonica and was wondering what a
> level 6 wizard could hunt? It would also be nice to know what to hunt
> a couple monsters after level 6 too. All help appreciated,
> thanks.Lott P.S. I think I can manage finding zones anywhere in the
> area, so don't feel obliged to describe how to reach the location.
